snippet.title: "Try to Fall Asleep" Trailer
snippet.description:
Close your eyes, fall asleep, and rediscover what truly happened...

John Herrin survived a horrible accident, damaging his brain and memory. Through falling asleep, he can rediscover his unfortunate past in his dreams, but because of his brain damage he'll start to see visions and hallucinations, and falling asleep won't be as easy as it seems at first...

Get "Try to Fall Asleep" Early Access on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/791770/Try_To_Fall_Asleep/

Follow AmberDrop on Twitter - https://twitter.com/AmberDropDevs
Join the Official TTFA Discord server - https://discord.gg/uz5WkNN

#Gaming #Horror #TryToFallAsleep
